title:
The Law of Iterated Logarithm for a Linear Stochastic Schrodinger
  Equation
abstract:
The moderate deviation principle is achieved for a stochastic Schrodinger
type equation by applying the classical Azencott method. The Friedlin-Wentzell
inequality derived by this method is then used to prove the Strassen's compact
law of the iterated logarithm for the equation.
